function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Covid-19 crisis","Impact":"Unprecedented impact on society and economy, accelerated adoption of digital technologies","Mitigation":"Implementation of IoT, AI, Big data, Cloud, etc","Technologies":"IoT, AI, Big data, Cloud","People":"Society and economy","Owner":"Research communities, government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Spread of disease","Impact":"Risk of disease propagation during drug delivery and purchase, strain on physical and human resources","Mitigation":"Use of IoT in drug delivery, monitoring, and management","Technologies":"IoT, IoMT","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, general public","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, pharmaceutical companies"},{"Description":"Access to medical facilities in remote locations","Impact":"Challenges in availing medical facilities for orthopaedic patients in remote locations","Mitigation":"Use of Internet of Medical Things (IoMT) to extend medical facilities to remote locations","Technologies":"IoMT","People":"Orthopaedic patients in remote locations","Owner":"Healthcare organizations"}]}
